discogs.name: The Soulsavers
discogs.profile: Electronic-rock-gospel duo of Rich Machin and Ian Glover, from Stoke-On-Trent. Guest vocalists include [a=Mark Lanegan] on their 2007 album [i][r=945108][/i] and 2009's [i][r=1888259][/i], and [a=Dave Gahan] on 2012's [i][r=3609622][/i], 2015's [i][r=7829894][/i] and 2021's [i]Imposter[/i] as lead vocalist.
